headline: Benefits Advisor at GroupSimple
summary:
Nothing gets me more excited than working with business leaders and supporting them in managing their organizations.  While I specialize in helping them manage their group benefit and retirement programs, I also like to support them in other ways through networking and sharing ideas on what has worked for others.  Being a business leader can be lonely as there isn't a ton of people one can rely on, so we see it as part of our mission to stand side-by-side with them as they continue to succeed.

I have been in group benefits industry since 2006 and have worked with groups across the nation in meeting their employee compensation goals.   This is a great business to be a part of because of the people you meet.  I look forward to many more years of contributing to the success of others.

Specialties: Group Insurance, Distrubution, Expatriate Benefit Plans, Executive Benefits, Inpatriate Programs, Employee Compensation, Benefits Administration, Disability Management

experiences.title: Benefits Advisor
experiences.description: GroupSimple delivers a simple, transparent and cost-saving benefits plan solution for small and mid-sized Canadian businesses who are tired of old, outdated, and expensive insurance practices.Using the latest technology, process innovation, and economies of scale -- we'll help you protect your people and your profits by designing a customizable, affordable benefits plan that is built to last. Isn't it time to put the "benefits" back into your benefits plan?

experiences.title: Faculty Member
experiences.description: I volunteer in sharing insights to other brokers and consultants within the group benefits sector.

experiences.title: Assistant Vice-President, Consulting Services
experiences.description: Supported consultants, brokers, and advisors in building wealth for them, their clients, and their businesses.

experiences.title: Vice President, Sales
experiences.description: I developed retail distribution for a line of educational products.

experiences.title: Account Representative
experiences.description: I worked with nurseries, garden centre's, and landscapers across the mid-west states, to provide better value for their clients through delivering high quality "hardy" plant material at a fair cost.

experiences.title: Sales Rep
experiences.description: I worked through a process that discovered who where the best "free agent" sales people within the lower mainland of BC, and placed them with companies that were looking to take their business to the next level.

education.school: University of Pennsylvania - The Wharton School
education.description: A specialty designation focusing on Canadian health care and group benefits.

accomplishment_publications.description: This article describes some of the very real risks Canadians face in regards to their health, and how employers can cost effectively provide financial protection for their valued team.

accomplishment_publications.description: Anyone can save a company money on a benefits plan, especially in the short term.  However, in achieving long term sustainable savings there are some considerations that need to be accounted for.

recommendations: Michael is committed to providing great service and group insurance packages for all of his clients.  He is bright and engaging, intuitive to understanding the dynamic insurance needs of any team to get you the best solution at the right price.  Highly recommend Michael and his team.

Michael is one of the best in his field.
His honesty and integrity are his trademarks.
I recommend Michael for all your benefits needs.
